root: ^"Thank you for taking care of them, but I'm afraid it's wasn't the last time I saw them. The name is Andrey."

Name: ^"Great, now that we have pleasantries out of the way tell me what made you come here."
ev
str
/str
/ev

s: ^"I was send by a blacksmith, to check up on you."

c-0: ^"So the old man sends you. I guess he wants this."
^He gives you the box full of wood.
^"Go and give it to him. And be careful there's more of these bandits in the woods. I just hope someone will take care of them for good."

s: ^"I'll see what I can do about that. See you around."
